website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills, well-built, durable staple gun that comes with a box of 1/4-inch T50 staples.
pros: Stanley's heavy-duty chrome-plated steel staple gun is strong, sturdy, and able to easily handle most average household stapling tasks
It is a bottom-loading device with a quick jam-clearing feature designed to save you time and frustration
cons: This stapler may be a little tougher to squeeze than some of the  other models in its price range

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for putting up some radiant barrier in my attic.....several thousand staples later it works like it did the first day. Easy to load - powerful - not too heavy or awkward. Not as ergonomic as front press style...but my front press style failed after just a hundred staples so bought this to replace it....and have no regrets. I am confident it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: James Iler

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous packaging, worthless staples
customer_reviews.text: After slicing my hand wide open on the packaging and bleeding all over the place, the stapler had the taste of human blood. i should have known better than to try to use it after that. It wanted flesh. It needed flesh. fortunately for me, the teeny tiny staples that ship with this thing couldn't penetrate drywall, much less human skin. This was a terrible experience all around. And now I need to shop for a stapler with normal packaging and some real staples that will actually go through paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an upholstry job for my dining room chairs and it worked excellent and now use it for several other projects around the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Requires Herculean Strength and Jams
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this staple gun required Herculean strength to operate. The amount of force required to push a staple through a piece of material was ridiculous. To make matters worse, the gun jammed after every single staple. The staple tray had to be opened and reloaded each time just to get one staple to come through. Perhaps this was a defective piece, but my experience was awful and I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Staple Gun
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is just as the other reviews say. It's strong and sturdy. Works great on small to medium projects. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This stapler does not feed the staples to the site of injection. The staples slide back and forth after being inserted and there is no way to align them with the head. The design in my opinion is grossly defective as a result. I tried several staples in different sources but there is no way to make certain a staple aligns properly. Expensive and non-functional.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terrence McGartyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Standard simple staple gun
customer_reviews.text: Standard and simple with no frills to do basic stapling tasks, works well for insulation hanging as well as other simple light hanging materials. Easy to find refills and to load with no problems. A+ for simplicity. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Placed a half length of staples in that it came with and it didn’t work. Placed a full length in and it stapled a few staples okay. Then placed full length back in and didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  Made in China.
customer_reviews.text: Made in China. It takes way to much strength to operate. It couldn’t have been meant to be like this when the engineers designed it. Junk. Not quite right
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Craftsman stapler that stopped working. The construction is well built and feels heavy in the hand. This is very powerful so be careful when stapling items to wood or any other surface. Highly recommend this for any workshop/garage.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyMac

customer_reviews.title: Staples NOT included
customer_reviews.text: The staple gun seems fine, but the staples advertised as included were not present on opening, so I can't attest to its use. I don't have others on hand to complete my project. Pretty frustrating to have to brave a home improvement warehouse in a pandemic because the package didn't contain what it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S-K

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy !! First of all It’s advertised that it comes with staples and no staples were found so that was a lie I’m really annoyed because now i have to go out and buy staples for my project in the middle of a pandemic, thinking of returning it back and the handle is way to hard I’ve worked with different types of staple guns and i can tell you right now this is not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Theyloveliz

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid, metal construction. Easy to load. Works as expected. Does what a well-made stapler is supposed to do. It does take a good bit of pressure to fire a staple. It helps to have your hand positioned to the rear of the handle. Nice that it has a side view staple "window" in order to tell when its time to add more staples Very pleased with this stapler.
customer_reviews.author: chief jd

customer_reviews.title: Its Stanley.
customer_reviews.text: Easy and simple. I personally use it to hang up my target posters when I go shooting. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Zeus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for canvas stretching
customer_reviews.text: I used this to stretch art over canvas boards and it worked perfectly. I have little, but strong, hands and it was still fairly easy to use despite the size of my hands. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This item works great. Easy to use even for a little hand like my own. I used it specifically to staple string lights to the wood railing in my back deck. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: great standard heavy duty staple
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, you don't have to worry about charging it, you do have to have good muscle and coordination. Used it with wood and layered upholstery, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: the true Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, This Should Last
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for & does what I wanted. I ordered several sizes of staples and now should be able to tackle just about any DIY project.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: What a Stapler!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! Love it. Use it in my classroom all the time. Very study and holds up well with use.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions on loading the staples if like me you are unfamiliar with this type of tool. Once figured out it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Henley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have needed a good one for so long. Finally bought one & it’s pretty easy to Usa and put staples in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Bought a random staple gun from a local hardware store. Stopped working very quickly. This is very clearly of a whole different quality level. Very sturdy, works well.
customer_reviews.author: John Shankman

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The staples were apparently stolen by the packer, so all I received was a staple gun without staples!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was sneaking in at the back of the couch’s chaise. Had to find a solution to keep that area sealed off. After searching for several of these on Amazon, I saw the brand; When it comes to tools, you cannot go wrong with Stanley. Very easy to use. Solid. Got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Very easy loader release and rounded trigger handle for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: worked much easier and faster than my old stapler. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin Incarnate

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this brand over the cheaper types , works great
customer_reviews.author: Ed from Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Do not spend time on this product, it is really poor quality, only second time use it begin stuck. I have to spend lot of time on it, but it just getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: Zhu Cao

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After ordering other brands and didn't work as they mentioned it would I decided to ordered this one. Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Manriquez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great. No jam at all
customer_reviews.text: Used it with Arrow stainless steel staples, and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to use it! It didn’t work and was hard to use. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sans staples
customer_reviews.text: Makes it hard to use when the promised staples are not included.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works good don’t fall for the cheaper Chinese crap on here
customer_reviews.author: John W. Baker III

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement (same model) of one that broke. . So my husband was very happy when the new one arrive. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Classic household tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the range to hang targets. Works as expected. Classic household tool.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: How much can it actually staple
customer_reviews.text: For what I wanted, I should have gotten the next higher level of strength.
customer_reviews.author: Sam O.

product_meta.title: Stanley TR110 Heavy Duty Steel Staple Gun 84 Staple Capacity, Squeeze Trigger and T50#504 Box of Staples
feature_bullets: Perfect for everyday stapling needs around the home or office
Heavy Duty, with convenient handle lock for safe storage
Quick-jam clear mechanism saves time and hassle;Bottom-loading, easy-slide, full-stick staple load
Uses Stanley TRA700 or arrow T-50 heavy-duty staples One Box Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
